name: Dicemancer
description:
Our unfinished game for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022.
We love the concept and may update the jam version later.

Controls :

- WASD to move
- QE to rotate
- Click on the sword icon to attack
- Click on the shield icon to parry
- In your inventory, you can use your dices to upgrade your statistics.

In the jam version, you start with a lot of dices in you inventory, make good use of it !
The post process didn't make it in the last build, so the miniature is different from the actual prototype.
